commitResults.messageTitle: Changed name, added Greet & Exit lines.
commitResults.messageBody: Changed name from Duke to DefinitelyRealRon. Greet, Exit and Horizontal lines added.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added echo and line encapsulation function.
commitResults.messageBody:
Echo function will repeat user input back to them and program only ends when user inputs "bye".
Line encapsulation function makes printing of statements easier.
Added some personality to DefinitelyRealRon.

commitResults.messageTitle: Detached ReadInput from Echo function.
commitResults.messageBody:
ReadInput is now a separate function that will call echo if needed.
Added "added: " to echo output.

commitResults.messageTitle: Completed List function.
commitResults.messageBody:
List function implemented using ArrayList.
Currently still using ReadInput as one big function. May need to refactor later.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Task class, Mark as Done
commitResults.messageBody: Added Task class to not clutter main. Added Mark as Done feature.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed minor alignment bug
Changed command identification to switch case
Refactored printing functions
Refactored Task class to include index
Todos, Events, Deadlines Completed Note: Event can only work is /from is before /to. Pending fix.
Added Error Handling
commitResults.messageBody:
Only added error handling for the 2 examples.
Lack of Description, Unknown Command

commitResults.messageTitle: Added mark/unmark error messages Error messages for:     1) Item out of bounds     2) Item already marked/unmarked     3) Incorrect mark/unmark input (only numbers allowed)
Added Error Handling for Deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
Error handling completed for:
    1) Missing /by comments
    2) Empty /by comments

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Error Handling & Update to Events
commitResults.messageBody:
Error Handling added for Events:
    1) Checks if /from & /to dates exist and is not empty
    2) Updated Events to handle if /to comes before /from

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Delete Function & adjust print format
commitResults.messageBody:
Added delete function to remove tasks from list. Deletion is by index.
Index for all tasks in list is updated after deletion.

Print format adjusted for all tasks to exclude index for newly added task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated Save & Load functions Initial load function will handle creating of data directory if it does not exist.
Completely refactored code to be more OOP Classes are also organised into packages.
commitResults.messageBody:
What each package contains:
commands    -> Commands to add,delete,mark,etc...
common      -> Messages that are used by ui
parser      -> Parser that makes sense of user input
storage     -> Functions related to I/O of file, encode/decode
task        -> How each task is defined, and TaskList
ui          -> Handles I/O from/to user

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated deadline and data encoder Updated deadline objects to use LocalDate object for deadline. Updated encoder to save deadline objects properly.

Updated Event task & Encoder, fixed Deadline task Updated Event task to use LocalDate object Updated Encoder for portion that encodes Event task to use the latest methods Fixed Deadline task formatting

Updated deadline task, data encode/decode, parser Updated deadline task to take in LocalDateTime object. Updated data encode/decode methods to save/load new ISO format for deadline tasks. Updated parser to read in format: dd/MM/yyyy HHmm Updated error check for deadline DateTime parse foramtting error

Updated Event task, encode/decode, parser Updated Event task to take in LocalDateTime object Updated logic for encode/decode to record ISO of LocalDateTime Updated parser to take in proper format for Event task
Merge remote-tracking branch 'branch-Level-8'
Added JavaDoc for DefinitelyRealRon & Ui Added comments for methods and classes in the following files: 1) DefinitelyRealRon.java 2) ui/Ui.java
Updated all Tasks objects with JavaDoc.
Updated all Commands with JavaDoc.
Updated Messages and Parser with JavaDoc.
Updated MarkCommand, Event, and Task with JavaDoc
Merge remote-tracking branch 'branch-JavaDoc'
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/add-gradle-support'
Modified gradle build file
Added 2 JUnit Tests and Integrated Gradle
Find function implemented Added a find function with corresponding messages and parser updates.
Added comments for prepareFind

Added Priority feature to tasks. Edited the following files: 1) Messages.java - Added messages for setting priority. 2) Tasks (Todo, Deadline, Event) - Updated to include priority attribute. 3) Parser.java - Added parsing logic for SetPriority command. 4) AddEventCommand.java, FindTaskCommand.java, ErrorCommand.java - Updated to handle priority where relevant. 5) DataEncoder.java - Updated to encode priority to storage. 6) DataDecoder.java - Updated to decode priority from storage.
commitResults.messageBody:
Added the following files:
1) SetPriorityCommand.java - New command to set task priority.
2) Priority.java - Enum for task priority levels. (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW)
